full_summary:
### Government Notice of Proposed Procurement for Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement

#### Contract Details

* Contract Title: Not supplied
* Contract Reference Number: PW-22-01010363
* Date Published: October 18, 2022
* Date of Expiry: November 03, 2022
* Contracting Entity: Canadian Human Rights Commission

#### Description of the Requirement

The Canadian Human Rights Commission is seeking to acquire Professional Audit Support Services under a supply arrangement. The contract will require services from a Project Manager/Leader, a Senior Auditor, and an Auditor. A total of 150 days of service is anticipated, with two one-year option periods.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes conducting internal control testing and financial process assessments in accordance with the Commission's five-year Internal Control over Financial Management (ICFM) framework. A minimum security level of 'Re liability' is required.

#### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Charissa Hsieh, Procurement and Material Management Advisor at the Canadian Human Rights Commission, by email at charissa.hsieh@chrc-ccdp.gc.ca or by phone at (343) 575-1141.

#### RFP Documents
RFP documents will be emailed directly to qualified supply arrangement holders. Please submit inquiries to the contracting officer regarding the RFP documents provided above.  

#### Qualifying Supply Arrangement Holders
Certified Supply Association holders were invited for the project provided above: Amendment Number: 1. (Prospective Supporting Services arrangement)

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada – Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada – Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada – Peru Free Trade Agreement 
* Canada – Colombia Free Trade Agreement  
* Canada – Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada – Korea Free Trade Agreement ( CFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
